lyric: I smell flesh, in the middle of the room.
speaker: monster

lyric: Moist and fresh, the boy a-bout to meet his doom!
speaker: monster

lyric: Is it really that amiss, caressing meat with my soft lips?
speaker: monster

lyric: I do find it oh so tasty, man meat paired with yummy pastries!
speaker: monster

lyric: I'd enjoy a little snack, salted, baked, it doesn't matter!
speaker: monster

lyric: You will be that little snack, roasted, toasted, on my platter!
speaker: monster

lyric: Grab a knife, take a slice, fill you up with sugar and spice!
speaker: monster

lyric: Blend you up, strain you out, make the flavor go round-and-round!
speaker: monster

lyric: Boy, you do seem pretty scared, this meal has just yet to prepare!
speaker: monster

lyric: Your teeth do look crunchy, fair? Better smile while they are still there!
speaker: monster

lyric: You seem pretty nice, but I'm outta rice.
speaker: monster

lyric: And I've got mouths to feed, so lemme see your spleen, okay!
speaker: monster

lyric: Your head goes here and your guts go there!
speaker: monster

lyric: And your tiny little feet just go ev-'ry-where!
speaker: monster

lyric: Well, you've made it this far kid. I have nothing else for you.
speaker: monster

lyric: Just so you know, your blood would've made a delicious brew.
speaker: monster
